question: With reference to IUCN (International Union for Conservation of Nature and Natural Resources) , which among the following is a correct statement?
option1: IUCN is known to save endangered species through dramatic, attention-grabbing protests
option2: IUCN is an organization of multinational corporations united to fight conservation efforts
option3: IUCN came up into existence after the Earth Summit of 1992
option4: IUCN is a collaboration of both the governmental agencies and private conservation groups
answer: IUCN is a collaboration of both the governmental agencies and private conservation groups
explanation: The International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN) works in the field of nature conservation and sustainable use of natural resources. It was founded in the year 1948. It is a collaboration of both the governmental agencies and private conservation groups. IUCN publishes “Red List” compiling information from a network of conservation organizations to rate which species are most endangered in the world.
